p: DAA-regimens were chosen by treating clinicians based on clinical criteria and viral genotype. The most frequently prescribed DAA-regimen was SOF + VEL ± RBV (25.7% overall), especially in subjects in treatment with antipsychotic (51.2% vs. 14.9%, p < 0.001). The regimen including OMB + PTV/r ± DAS ± RBV was never prescribed in group B patients ( p = 0.006).
